basics.name: Elijah Parker
basics.label: Wireless Cyber Capabilities Engineer
basics.contact: You can find my contact info on my pdf resume above
basics.summary: With degrees in Electrical Engineering and Computer Engineering, I am committed to honing my skills to make a positive impact on the world.

work.name: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
Open-Ended Reasoning and Knowledge Acquisition Lab
work.summary: Implemented MFCC technique for speech recognition to extract audio features from the EPIC-KITCHENS-100 dataset for multi-modal understanding in ego-centric videos.

work.name: Microelectronics Fabrication Lab, Auburn
work.summary: Aided electrical engineering PhD students with chemical processes related to microelectronics fabrication; designed and manufactured custom aluminum parts; maintained Python code for inventory management.

work.name: SiO2 Medical Products
work.summary: Aided process engineers by operating, validating, and debugging manufacturing machinery; ensured quality control and thorough documentation.

work.name: Technology Service Corporation
work.summary: Developed Python code to streamline testing processes and ensured product quality.

awards.title: Computer Engineering Student of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized as the top student in Computer Engineering for outstanding academic and project achievements.

awards.title: ECE Capstone Showcase Outstanding Project Award
awards.summary: Awarded for the Distributed Agricultural Monitoring Network project at the Capstone Showcase.

awards.title: Dean's List

awards.summary: Achieved Dean's List honors every semester from Fall 2019 to Spring 2024.
